positions.name: Capitolis
positions.title: Fintech
description: I was assigned first to build better-designed automation environments and tools for the firm.
I’ve brought the new Cypress library into the company automation tools arsenal. I was also assigned to teach and mentor
other developers on how to use it.
I was also assigned on tasks which involved developing React-Redux UI, Node.js/Java services, and all in Microservices
environment. Therefore, the position required me to work in the frontend and backend sides of the product.
